executive_summary: Implementation of Galaxy Defender as a pure HTML/JavaScript client-side game featuring a rocket ship that follows mouse cursor horizontally to dodge asteroids and UFOs while collecting stars. The game includes vertical scrolling mechanics, collision detection, scoring system, and progressive difficulty increase every 10 seconds.

tasks.description: Create HTML structure and basic styling
tasks.requirements: Set up the main HTML file with canvas element for game rendering, basic CSS styling for space theme, and responsive design
tasks.test_criteria: HTML file loads properly, canvas is visible and properly sized, basic styling is applied

tasks.description: Implement game initialization and canvas setup
tasks.requirements: Initialize HTML5 canvas, set up game loop, create basic game state management, and establish coordinate system
tasks.test_criteria: Canvas renders properly, game loop runs at consistent frame rate, basic game state variables are initialized

tasks.description: Create player rocket entity with mouse-following movement
tasks.requirements: Implement rocket ship entity (🚀) that follows mouse cursor horizontally only, with proper boundary constraints within canvas
tasks.test_criteria: Rocket appears on screen, follows mouse cursor horizontally, stays within canvas boundaries, vertical position remains fixed

tasks.requirements: Create system for spawning and managing falling objects (⭐ stars, ☄️ asteroids, 🛸 UFOs) that descend from top of screen at high speed
tasks.test_criteria: Objects spawn randomly at top of screen, move downward at appropriate speed, are removed when they exit screen bottom

tasks.requirements: Create collision detection between player rocket and all falling objects, distinguishing between collectible stars and harmful objects
tasks.test_criteria: Collisions are accurately detected, different object types trigger appropriate responses, collision boundaries are properly calculated

tasks.description: Implement scoring system for star collection
tasks.requirements: Add scoring mechanism that awards 50 points when player collects a star, display current score on screen
tasks.test_criteria: Score increases by 50 when star is collected, score is displayed and updates in real-time, star disappears upon collection

tasks.description: Implement game over system for harmful collisions
tasks.requirements: Create game over state triggered by collision with asteroids or UFOs, display game over screen with final score
tasks.test_criteria: Game ends immediately upon collision with asteroid or UFO, game over screen displays, final score is shown

tasks.requirements: Add system that increases game speed every 10 seconds to make the game progressively harder
tasks.test_criteria: Game speed increases noticeably every 10 seconds, difficulty progression is smooth and challenging, timer tracks elapsed time accurately

tasks.requirements: Implement ability to restart the game after game over, reset all game state variables to initial values
tasks.test_criteria: Game can be restarted from game over screen, all variables reset properly, new game starts with initial difficulty

tasks.requirements: Optimize rendering performance, add visual polish, ensure smooth gameplay across different devices
tasks.test_criteria: Game runs smoothly at 60fps, visual elements are crisp and well-positioned, responsive design works on different screen sizes

file_structure.description: Simple client-side structure with HTML entry point, CSS styling, and JavaScript game logic
